name: Little Green Blob
description:
A platformer for Gameboy Color. Play as a blob of green goo that shrinks as it moves or falls down. Try to get to the end of a level to move onto the next one.

Written in C using gbdk-2020.
For source code see: Github project

ControlsMoveWASD / Arrow Keys
A
Z / J
BX / K
StartEnterSelectShift

Dropping down through half height platforms can be done with DOWN+A.

If you get stuck in a level, START will return you to the main menu to skip a level.
